类 Ship

java.lang.Object
  Ship

public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object

A simple modle of a ship.The Ship class will specify the attributes and behaviours of all ships within the game.

版本：
1.0
作者：
Haoyu Zhang

构造方法摘要
Ship()
          Create a Ship with default constructor.
Ship(java.lang.String shipName, int xPos, int yPos, int noOfHitsMade, int noOfHitsNeeded)
          Create a Ship with non-default constructor.

          Display values of attributes of a ship.

构造方法详细信息

Ship

public Ship()
Create a Ship with default constructor.

Ship

public Ship(java.lang.String shipName,
            int xPos,
            int yPos,
            int noOfHitsMade,
            int noOfHitsNeeded)
Create a Ship with non-default constructor.

参数：
shipName - The name of the ship.
xPos - The x coordinate of the ship,which indicate which column the ship is in the grid.
yPos - The y coordinate of the ship,which indicate which row the ship is in the grid.
noOfHitsMade - The number of hits the ship takes.
noOfHitsNeeded - The number of hits needed to destory the ship.
